_prev_prog_2.FR_OtherType: Local Fire Codes  Chlorine Institute Standards
_prev_prog_2.TR_OtherType: Safety Program - all involved people meet after 5:00 pm for program and review
_prev_prog_2.CT_OtherType: All involved people study 3 video tapes
_prev_prog_2.Description: Comply with DOT and OSHA Regulations.  Have had several state OSHA Reviews.  File yearly with SARA Title III.  Work closely with Natchez Fire Dept, Adams County Civil Defense, and welcome state OSHA visits.  Hold periodic safety committee meetings with personnel.  Have Hazard Communication Program.  Try to comply with all that we can do.  See Executive Summary.

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
F. R. Blankenstein Co. has been under this name since 1939. Our sales are approximately 80% wholesale/industrial and 20% retail. We stock and sell welding, restaurant, janitorial, paper, water treatment, swimming pool, and household supplies and equipment. All merchandise purchased from our suppliers are bought, received, and sold as it comes from them. Nothing is altered, repacked, relabeled, manufactured or otherwise.

For over 40 years we have bought, stocked, and sold 1 501b. Cylinders of chlorine gas. (from Tesco, then Thompson-Hayward, and now Harcros) During this four-decade span we, with our suppliers, have held safety-training seminars every two to four years for our customers. Factory qualified people demonstrate safety kits and put on training programs including slides, film, and video tape. All water works, waste water systems, fire departments, and interested industries are invited and most attend. This was done a long time before the government regulations. We do not sell chlorine gas to anyone else than those named. We do not sell chlorine gas to any swimming pools.

We work closely with the Natchez Fire Department and the Adams County Civil Defense. The Fire Department brought each fireman on each of the three shifts to our warehouse and videotaped our whole facility as we walked through the whole building discussing hazards and plans in case of an emergency. If anything develops we call at

    once:    911
        Natchez Fire Department
        Adams County Civil Defense
        Mema
        Harcros Chemical Company
